text: Tyahi subhasucana allahale aphna sevakaharula'i dincha. Jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma gare. Bhanidinus ki ‘‘ma usako timisita kunai parisramika magdina, matra nikatatako premabhava cahanchu. Jasale kunai neki gadarcha, hamile usako nimti usako nekima vrd'dhi garnechaum. Niscaya nai allaha atyanta ksamasila ra thulo gunagrahaka ho.’’
